Class CalendarInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • CalendarInfo

  • public class CalendarInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains most of a Calendar's info This class was taken/adapted from https://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/21function/Calendar.java.html, credits to princeton as well as https://github.com/dwatring/Memo-Calendar/blob/master/src/CalendarData.java , author dwatring
